taskDescription:
Identify all integers in the following list: −9.2, 13, −1, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <msqrt>
    <mn>47</mn>
  </msqrt>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\sqrt {47}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <msqrt>
        <mn>3</mn>
      </msqrt>
    </mrow>
    <mn>2</mn>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{\sqrt 3 }}{2}</annotation></semantics></math>, 567, −300.
